knimeNode.name: Build CWL Array
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a CWL array object from other objects.

fullDescription.intro: This node merges several CWL objects into an array object. If the third port is an array, the two other ports are inserted into this object. Otherwise all three objects are merged into a new array.

ports.inPort: A CWL object to put into the array.
A CWL object to put into the array.
A CWL object to put into the array or, if this is a array, the array to append the other objects to.
